text:
I had the pleasure of working with David on a major initiative to bring a paperless patient platform to dental practices, revolutionizing how patient data is collected and improving overall efficiency. David's technical expertise and commitment to collaboration made him an invaluable member of our team.
David excelled in grooming sessions, consistently asking thoughtful questions and seeking clarity to ensure tasks were understood and executed with precision. Throughout our sprints, he effectively used tools like Jira to communicate progress and address any roadblocks, demonstrating a proactive and solutions-oriented mindset. His punctuality and engagement were evident in his on-time task delivery, active participation in daily standups, and clear demonstrations of his work. David's responsiveness to feedback and his ability to incorporate changes seamlessly ensured the success of our project deliverables.
Beyond his technical skills, David showcased a deep understanding of the daily operations of a dental office, which added immense value to the platform. By listening and learning from end users, he contributed to creating a product that truly addressed the needs of dental practices. David's proficiency in front-end frameworks like React and Angular, paired with his collaborative approach, allowed him to deliver high-quality, user-friendly web applications. His use of debugging tools, optimization techniques, and commitment to coding best practices enhanced the performance and reliability of our solutions.
I highly recommend David for any role where technical expertise, teamwork, and a user-focused approach are critical. He would be an outstanding asset to any organization.
author: Andrea Gallimore

text: David is an excellent team member. Working as a part of my Front End Engineering team, David has proved to be adaptable, dedicated, dependable, with a growing confidence, and expending skill set. Through the years that I have worked with him so far, he has taken on tasks that vary on the difficulty spectrum and solved them all. David is frequently looking for the best way to solve a problem and delivering on time and within estimates. David was flexible enough to work with an EOL version of Angular and new react frameworks at the same building each in different simultaneous projects. His time and attention management is excellent,. More recently he has begun leading milestone demonstrations intended for management and assisting peers coming into the codebases.. David has always been a strong performer, and if given the chance in the future I would certainly recommend his hire.
author: Chris Drottar

text: Working with David has been a great experience. His technical skills and creativity made him a valuable part of our team. He effectively translated front-end requirements into streamlined systems and enhanced dynamic forms using React, Angular, and CSS. I was especially impressed by his work on the HOP UI Kit, which showcased his commitment to both quality and innovation. David also communicated effectively with the product team, consistently reviewing designs, identifying gaps, and proposing alternative technical solutions to help define use cases in more detail. He was always ready to help any team member for onboarding or for new project work, making him a great team player. His strong teamwork and collaboration helped make our project a success.
author: Ashwini Bauskar

text: I had the honor of working with David at Internet Brands where he was instrumental in bringing our complex healthcare webapps to life. A solid, effective frontend dev with a crisp sense for building the right solutions at the right time, he works efficiently and autonomously. Any problem we could think of, I was confident that David would be able to find a solution. While his skills in frontend technologies like React and Angular are great, what makes him a standout teammate is his ability to break down complex problems into manageable pieces and his attention to detail.
author: Deepika Chaudhari

text: My team was primarily backend developers, but we would regularly borrow David in order to build react bundles for our projects. David was a highly skilled front end developer, who was a pleasure to work with. We could give him a design in figma or any other tool and he could create a pixel perfect implementation. If he had any concerns or questions, he would raise them immediately and proactively. If I had the opportunity, I would absolutely work with David again.
author: Terence Kulik

text: David has collaborated closely with all of the front-end developers on my team over the past few years. He consistently demonstrated meticulous attention to detail, a clear design vision, and an ability to identify gaps in the process, proactively communicating them to the product team. I was highly impressed with his work and would confidently recommend him
author: Zohreh Malek

text: David plays an important roles in our frontend development team, he has shown a great progress from an associate to a well establish frontend developer. He is quick witted and passionate in his work, a very good communicator to make sure he can push his task forward.
author: Budi Chandra
